title: Servant of the Empire
description: Librarian note: This is an alternate cover edition of ISBN 9780586203811PLAY THE GAMEMara of Acoma, Ruling Lady of her house, is a force to be reckoned with when playing the bloody politics of the Game of the Council.She's made great gains for her followers within the Empire, including valuable new lands. But they need cultivating, and slaves are in short supply due to the incessant war effort against Midkemia.PLAY TO WINMara knows you don't get far without taking a gamble, so against advice she buys a group of Midkemian prisoners-of-war...Enter the mysterious world of Kelewan, where murder is as rife as false diplomacy. Enter a world of sweeping imagination and magical intrigue from two of the greatest writers of modern fantasy.
author: Raymond E. Feist
